org.jbei.ice.lib.account

Class AccountController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbei.ice.lib.account.AccountController

  • public class AccountController
extends Object
    ABI to manipulate Account objects.

    This class contains methods that wrap AccountDAO to manipulate Account objects.

    Author:
    Timothy Ham, Zinovii Dmytriv, Hector Plahar

      • get

        public Account get(long id)
        Retrieve account from the database by database id.
        Parameters:
        id - Database id of account
        Returns:
        Account for the id

      • resetPassword

        public void resetPassword(String email,
                 boolean sendEmail,
                 String url)
                   throws ControllerException
        Changes user's password
        Parameters:
        email - unique account identifier
        sendEmail - whether to notify user of password change
        url - current site url
        Throws:
        ControllerException - if account could not be retrieved using unique identifier

      • updatePassword

        public void updatePassword(String email,
                  String password)
                    throws ControllerException
        Updates account password associated the account email. It encrypts it before associating it with the account
        Parameters:
        email - user unique identifier
        password - new password
        Throws:
        ControllerException

      • createNewAccount

        public String createNewAccount(AccountTransfer info,
                      boolean sendEmail)
                        throws ControllerException
        Creates a new account using the parameters passed. A random password is initially generated , encrypted and assigned to the account
        Parameters:
        info - contains information needed to create account
        sendEmail - whether to send account information (including password by email)
        Returns:
        generated password
        Throws:
        ControllerException - in the event email is already assigned to another user or is empty

      • authenticate

        public boolean authenticate(String login,
                   String password,
                   String ip)
                     throws InvalidCredentialsException,
                            ControllerException
        Authenticate a user in the database.

        Using the IAuthentication specified in the settings file, authenticate the user, and return the sessionData

        Parameters:
        login -
        password -
        ip - IP Address of the user.
        Throws:
        InvalidCredentialsException
        ControllerException

      • authenticate

      • isAuthenticated

        public static boolean isAuthenticated(String sessionKey)
        See if the given sessionKey is still authenticated with the system.
        Parameters:
        sessionKey - unique session identifier
        Returns:
        True if sessionKey is still authenticated (active) to the system.

      • invalidate

        public static void invalidate(String sessionKey)
        De-authenticate the given sessionKey. The user is logged out from the system.
        Parameters:
        sessionKey - unique session identifier
